title: RP CARDS
body:
IF I'LL BUY RP CARD IN USA CAN I USE IT ON EUW SERVER? 
{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Nope, RP cards are specific to the region they're purchased from.  If you've got an RP card for another region, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but our billing team will look into your specific issue to see if any options can be found.  I hope that helps!
